name: Dungeon Dash (Tufayl)
description:
This game was made for the Spooktober 2021 Game Jam.

This is a classics Dungeon, Platformer game where you have to collect as many Upgrades as possible before proceeding to the next Dungeon. All the Dungeons are procedurally generated, which just means that no two Dungeons will be the same.

Hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed making it!

Also check out my YouTube channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCifZL9ex39M9Lx46O0NJ0mQ
